headline: GLASSMAN HIGH VOLTAGE POWER SUPPLY, 5 kV
description: High Voltage Power Supply Positive or Negative Polarity
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > High Voltage Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer Glassman
Model PS/FC05P24 or PS/FC05N24
Maximum Output Voltage 5.0 kV
Maximum Output Current 24.0 mA
Bipolar No
Panel Meters Digital
Ripple <0.02% RMS of rated voltage +300mV at full load
Regulation Better than 0.1%
Interface I/O Port
External Cooling Air Cooled
Other Information


Positive or Negative Polarity, request when ordering (not user configurable)
Can be configured for 230VAC input, request when ordering (not user configurable)
SHV output connector, high voltage cable is NOT included
RS232 option is NOT included

We will not honor our 90 day warranty if this power supply will be used for the spark gap applications

Extended Description Details at FC_SeriesSpecs.pdf
Power Requirements 115 V 48-440 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Excellent
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 20.000 in (50.8 cm)

Weight 12 lb (5 kg)
